tables.table_schema:
Create TABLE usage_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    usage_hours INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES smart_home_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE device_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    usage_time TIME,
    usage_duration INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES smarthome_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE device_status (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    status_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES smarthome_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE usage_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_type VARCHAR(50),
    total_usage_duration INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES smarthome_devices(device_id)
);
